jei.tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.band_of_: You can find it in the Magician's Cabin
jei.tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.celestia: You can find it in the Magician's Cabin
jei.tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.nature_g: Destruction of cave vines has a chance of obtaining
message.xfws_someitems.the_mirror_of_dea: After experiencing death and life, you return to the human world. What will you do next?
Yin and Yang are orderly, and you are strong in the way of defying heaven.
The resentment has been repaid, and the soul returns to Jiuquan. Why suffer from the calamity of dust again?
How can the flag be lowered if the blood debt is not paid off? I have a secret method to help you eliminate all enemies!
Do you seek rebirth for revenge?
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.arcane_flowe: When you need mana, automatically use the mana potion in your backpack
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.celestial_cu: Restore 10 times the mana value of the damage received after injury
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.celestial_ma: Increase the picking distance of mana stars
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.ethereal_lan: Give it fuel, and it will light up the darkness for you with a torch when you put it on
Left click on the fuel button to consume it all, right click to consume it one by one
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.magic_cuffs: Restore 10 times the mana value of the damage received after injury
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.magnet_flowe: When you need mana, automatically use the mana potion in your backpack.Greatly increasing the pickup range for Stars
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.mana_flower: When you need mana, automatically use the mana potion in your backpack
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.sculk_katana: Swing this sword and launch a sonic boom
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.sculk_megaph: Increases the range and damage of the Sonic Boom of the Sculk Katana
tooltip.item.xfws_someitems.the_mirror_o: Staring into this mirror to return to the point of death
